```{r}
library(readr)

library(dplyr)

movies <- read_delim("Scrapping/TMDB_movie_dataset_v11_1mill.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
View(TMDB_movie_dataset_v11_1mill)

movies <-TMDB_movie_dataset_v11_1mill

movies <- movies %>%
  mutate(release_year = as.numeric(format(as.Date(release_date, format = "%Y-%m-%d"), "%Y")))

# Filter the dataset to include only movies with year > 2010
filtered_movies <- movies %>%
  filter(release_year > 2010)

# Save the filtered dataset to a CSV file
write.csv(filtered_movies, "C:/Users/sofia/Documents/Documentos/Master Computational Social Sciences/TFM/Master Thesis/Scrapping/TMDB_movie_dataset_v11_1mill_filter.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
